    {
        dump( "Inbound Voice" );

        byte[] audioSample = new byte[ audioSampleSize ];
        payload.get( audioSample );

        long ts = this.getTimestamp ();
        
        if ( this.call != null ) {
            this.call.onReceivedVoicePDU( ts, audioSample );
